review: I've been using Amazon Fire TV at our beach cabin for a month or so, and we are very pleased with the system.  Because we use our cabin on occasional weekends, we didn't want full-blown cable TV, but wanted more than just playing Blu-ray movies or listening to the radio.  This is the perfect all-in-one entertainment package.  It's simple to set up, activate and use.  As Prime members, we can watch practically any movie we want at no charge, listen to our Pandora stations, or use the gaming features.  Amazon TV was recommended to us, and we're very glad we finally did it!
